main event: An Air Force pilot observed a bright red round object in Ephrata, Washington, which rapidly disappeared after 7 minutes.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 1/15 the size of the moon., The object's color changed from white to red before disappearing., The Air Force pilot confirmed a target was in contact but ground control did not confirm this., The object was tracked by radar at an estimated speed of 1230 knots., The conclusion suggested the object could be Venus, an aircraft, or an astronomical object.
